Plot: A novel that chronicles the lives of two women who could not be more different: Becky Sharp, an orphan whose only resources are her vast ambitions, her native wit, and her loose morals; and her schoolmate Amelia Sedley, a typically naive Victorian heroine, the pampered daughter of a wealthy family.
Characters: Amelia Sedley, Rebecca Sharp, William Dobbin, George Osborne, Rawdon Crawley, Jos Sedley, Sir Pitt Crawley, Matilda Crawley
